title: Front Page , Rumors and Kirk Franklin Interview
itunes:title: Front Page , Rumors and Kirk Franklin Interview
description:
Today on the show, we Angela spoke on the high gas prices and heat waves across the world during "Front Page News". Next we had the icon himself Kirk Franklin stop by where he spoke about his love for Maverick City Music Group, his relationship status with his son, R.Kelly and more. Also, Angela teases a snip of Eminem and Ceelo new song “The King and I” From ‘Elvis’ Biopic Soundtrack. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
